arcade.patch.agent.action

Class PatchActionRemove

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.agent.action.PatchActionRemove
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    public class PatchActionRemove
extends java.lang.Object
implements Action
    Implementation of Action for removing cell agents.

    The action is stepped once after TIME_DELAY. The action will remove all cell agents within the specified radius REMOVE_RADIUS from the center of the simulation. Quiescent cells bordering the removal site are set to undefined state.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
